Classes in com.brightcove.player.event used by com.brightcove.freewheel.controller
AbstractComponent
          Provides some common implementation that useful to all that interact with RegisteringEventEmitters components, including: Maintaining a reference to an EventEmitter Wraps incoming EventEmitter in a RegisteringEventEmitter Ensures incoming EventEmitter is not null Maintains a collection of EventListener tokens for use with EventEmitter.off() Provides standard required method for initalizing Event listeners
Component
          Classes that implement this interface will be designed to work with the EventEmitter System Classes that implement this interface should use the Emits and ListensFor annotations
Emits
          Annotation used for Component classes in order to describe what EventTypes this Component will Emits
EventEmitter
          Defines the public facing api for classes that wish to emit events.
ListensFor
          Annotation used for Component classes in order to describe what EventTypes this Component will ListensFor.

          Provides some common implementation that useful to all that interact with RegisteringEventEmitters components, including: Maintaining a reference to an EventEmitter Wraps incoming EventEmitter in a RegisteringEventEmitter Ensures incoming EventEmitter is not null Maintains a collection of EventListener tokens for use with EventEmitter.off() Provides standard required method for initalizing Event listeners

Emits
          Annotation used for Component classes in order to describe what EventTypes this Component will Emits
Event
          Represents a single Event, that is designed to be passed down a chain of listeners.
EventEmitter
          Defines the public facing api for classes that wish to emit events.
EventListener
          Abstract class used as part of the event registration process.
ListensFor
          Annotation used for Component classes in order to describe what EventTypes this Component will ListensFor.

Component
          Classes that implement this interface will be designed to work with the EventEmitter System Classes that implement this interface should use the Emits and ListensFor annotations
Default
          This annotation should be used to mark the processEvent method when declaring a subclass of EventListener.

Classes in com.brightcove.player.event used by com.brightcove.player.event

          Defines the public facing api for classes that wish to emit events.
EventListener
          Abstract class used as part of the event registration process.
ListensFor
          Annotation used for Component classes in order to describe what EventTypes this Component will ListensFor.
RegisteringEventEmitter
          The RegisteringEventEmitter allows developers to contain which events their Components are intended to listen for and emit.
